duties_responsibilities.duty: Represent the company within targeted accounts in a sales territory to grow the brand, market-share, and sales revenues.
Identify business opportunities within sales segments.
Plan strategy for reseller engagement and build sustainable relationships with sales reps.
Own all sales quotes with targeted accounts, build pipeline, and update pipe-line report with weekly status and changes.
Coordinate customer visits, present and train customer reps on product offerings, and attend regional marketing shows and events.
Participate in one on one meetings with management, complete daily call expectations and CRM input set forth by management.
